tv.amwa.maj.io.xml

Interface XMLSerializable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ApplicationPluginObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AAFElement, AAFStream, AES3PCMDescriptorImpl, AIFCDescriptorImpl, ANCDataDescriptorImpl, ApplicationObjectImpl, ApplicationPluginObjectImpl, ApplicationReferencedObjectImpl, AUIDImpl, AuxiliaryDescriptorImpl, AVCSubDescriptorImpl, BWFImportDescriptorImpl, CDCIDescriptorImpl, ClassDefinitionImpl, ConstantValueImpl, ContentStorageImpl, ContributorImpl, ControlPointImpl, CPSystemItemImpl, DataEssenceDescriptorImpl, DefaultFadeImpl, DeltaEntryImpl, DictionaryImpl, EdgeCodeValueImpl, EssenceElementImpl, EventTrackImpl, IndexEntryImpl, KLVDataImpl, LocatorImpl, MPEGVideoDescriptorImpl, NetworkLocatorImpl, OrganisationImpl, PackageIDImpl, PersonImpl, PolyFileDescriptorImpl, ProductVersionImpl, PropertyDefinitionImpl, PropertyWrapperDefinitionImpl, RandomIndexItemImpl, RationalImpl, RGBAComponentImpl, RIFFChunkImpl, SimpleDescriptionImpl, SourceReferenceValueImpl, StaticTrackImpl, SubDescriptorImpl, TextLocatorImpl, TimecodeValueImpl, TimelineTrackImpl, TimeStampImpl, TrackImpl, TypeDefinitionObjectReferenceImpl, TypeDefinitionStrongObjectReferenceImpl, TypeDefinitionVariableArrayImpl, TypeDefinitionWeakObjectReferenceImpl, VBIDataDescriptorImpl

    public interface XMLSerializable

    Specifies a class that can add comments and extra element to its current value to nodes of an XML DOM tree. All metadata objects can serialize themselves as XML using their symbol names. If this interface is implemented, a descriptive comment can be added and additional child nodes created.

    See Also:
    XMLFactory, XMLBuilder.toXML(tv.amwa.maj.industry.MetadataObject), ClassDefinition.getSymbol(), PropertyDefinition.getSymbol()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void appendXMLChildren(Node parent)
      Append extra child elements to the given parent node to serialize the value of an object to an XML fragment.
      String getComment()
      Include a comment when serializing a value to XML.

    • Method Detail

      • appendXMLChildren

        void appendXMLChildren(Node parent)

        Append extra child elements to the given parent node to serialize the value of an object to an XML fragment. Methods of the XMLBuilder class are provided to help with this process.

        Parameters:
        parent - XML parent element to append child nodes to.

      • getComment

        String getComment()

        Include a comment when serializing a value to XML. The comment will be inserted as the first child node of the element representing the class.

        Returns:
        Comment to add as the first child node of the element representing this class.
